mcq.statement: Where was the general session of the All-India Muslim League held on March 23, 1940, where the Lahore Resolution was passed?
mcq.one_liner: The general session of the All-India Muslim League on March 23, 1940, where the Lahore Resolution was passed, was held at **Minto Park, Lahore**.

suggestions.topic: Muhammad Ali Jinnah and Muslim League (1913)
